testcase.classname: To validate Login Functionality in Facebook Application
testcase.name: To validate Login using invalid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: When User enter Invalid username and Invalid password.......................passed And User click the login button.............................................passed Then User is in invalid credential page.....................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Login Functionality in Facebook Application
